name: Goat Frenzy Unlimited - 3D Simulator
description:
Deer and Pink Goat now included!!
Better controls for better game play!

aN aNGry GoAt RuNNinG aRoUNd. gOaT sMash CaR. GOaT smAsH HeLiCoPTer. GoAt wIn. GOaT AlwAYS Win.

This version gives you 10 minutes per round and no ads. It is fun, and will get much more fun as the upgrades come out in the next weeks.


An angry goat has gone loose on the city streets. You are in control of this super powerful goat. Use his super strength to throw cars, helicopters, tanks, and other large objects. Hours of fun to be had searching around for fun objects to toss around. The object of the game is to score as many points as possible before the time runs out. Keep searching, you never know what you may find.
